question: Sophie's uncle said that she had £210 budgeted for her birthday party. She wants to make sure she and her friends all get to play one round of mini-golf, have £3 in arcade tokens, and get to ride the roller coaster twice. A round of mini-golf is £9. The roller coaster cost £9 a ride. How many friends can she invite?
answer:
The roller coaster will cost £18 per person because 9*2 = <<9*2=18>>18
Each person costs £30 because 3 + 9 + 18 = <<3+9+18=30>>30
7 total people can attend because 210 / 30 = <<210/30=7>>7
She can invite 6 friends because 7 - 1 =<<7-1=6>>6
#### 6
